query:
SELECT 
  'users' as table_name, COUNT(*) as count FROM users
UNION ALL SELECT 'time_series', COUNT(*) FROM time_series
UNION ALL SELECT 'research_publications', COUNT(*) FROM research_publications
UNION ALL SELECT 'glossary_terms', COUNT(*) FROM glossary_terms
UNION ALL SELECT 'economic_events', COUNT(*) FROM economic_events
UNION ALL SELECT 'data_sources', COUNT(*) FROM data_sources
UNION ALL SELECT 'indicator_definitions', COUNT(*) FROM indicator_definitions
UNION ALL SELECT 'scheduler_jobs', COUNT(*) FROM scheduler_jobs
UNION ALL SELECT 'commercial_banks', COUNT(*) FROM commercial_banks
UNION ALL SELECT 'stakeholders', COUNT(*) FROM stakeholders
UNION ALL SELECT 'provenance_ledger_full', COUNT(*) FROM provenance_ledger_full
UNION ALL SELECT 'confidence_ratings', COUNT(*) FROM confidence_ratings
UNION ALL SELECT 'data_contradictions', COUNT(*) FROM data_contradictions
UNION ALL SELECT 'public_changelog', COUNT(*) FROM public_changelog
UNION ALL SELECT 'data_vintages', COUNT(*) FROM data_vintages;
